16 // 2.0 Protocol
17 #define DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_HEADER_1 0
18 #define DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_HEADER_2 1
19 #define DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_HEADER_3 2
20 #define DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_RESERVED 3
21 #define DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_ID 4
22 #define DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_LENGTH_L 5
23 #define DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_LENGTH_H 6
24 #define DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_INST 7
25 #define DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_ERROR 8
26 #define DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_INST_PARAM 8
27 #define DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_STATUS_PARAM 9
28

31 #define DXL1_0_PACKET_IDX_HEADER_2 1
32 #define DXL1_0_PACKET_IDX_ID 2
33 #define DXL1_0_PACKET_IDX_LENGTH 3
34 #define DXL1_0_PACKET_IDX_INST 4
35 #define DXL1_0_PACKET_IDX_ERROR 4
36 #define DXL1_0_PACKET_IDX_PARAM 5

62 DXLLibErrorCode_t begin_make_dxl_packet(InfoToMakeDXLPacket_t* p_make_packet,
63  uint8_t id, uint8_t protocol_ver, uint8_t inst_idx, uint8_t err_idx,
64  uint8_t* p_packet_buf, uint16_t packet_buf_capacity)
65 {
66  if(p_packet_buf == NULL){
67  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
68  }
69 
70  if(protocol_ver == 2){
71  if(id == 0xFD && id == 0xFF){ //http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#packet-id
72  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_INVAILD_ID;
73  }
74  if(packet_buf_capacity < 11){ //http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#status-packet
75  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH_BUFFER_SIZE;
76  }
77  }else if(protocol_ver == 1){
78  if(id == 0xFF){ //http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#packet-id
79  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_INVAILD_ID;
80  }
81  if(packet_buf_capacity < 6){ //http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#instruction-packet
82  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH_BUFFER_SIZE;
83  }
84  }else{
85  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_INVAILD_PROTOCOL_VERSION;
86  }
87 
88  p_make_packet->id = id;
89  p_make_packet->protocol_ver = protocol_ver;
90  p_make_packet->inst_idx = inst_idx;
91  p_make_packet->err_idx = err_idx;
92  p_make_packet->p_packet_buf = p_packet_buf;
93  p_make_packet->packet_buf_capacity = packet_buf_capacity;
94  p_make_packet->param_length = 0;
95  p_make_packet->generated_packet_length = 0;
96  p_make_packet->is_init = true;
97 
98  return DXL_LIB_OK;
99 }
100 
101 
102 DXLLibErrorCode_t add_param_to_dxl_packet(InfoToMakeDXLPacket_t* p_make_packet, uint8_t *p_param, uint16_t param_len)
103 {
104  DXLLibErrorCode_t ret;
105 
106  if(p_make_packet == NULL){
107  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
108  }else if(p_make_packet->is_init == false){
109  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
110  }
111 
112  if(p_make_packet->protocol_ver == 2){
113  ret = add_param_to_dxl2_0_packet(p_make_packet, p_param, param_len);
114  }else if(p_make_packet->protocol_ver == 1){
115  ret = add_param_to_dxl1_0_packet(p_make_packet, p_param, param_len);
116  }else{
117  ret = DXL_LIB_ERROR_INVAILD_PROTOCOL_VERSION;
118  }
119 
120  return ret;
121 }
122 
123 static DXLLibErrorCode_t add_param_to_dxl1_0_packet(InfoToMakeDXLPacket_t* p_make_packet, uint8_t *p_param, uint16_t param_len)
124 {
125  uint8_t *p_param_buf;
126  uint16_t i, generated_param_len;
127 
128  generated_param_len = p_make_packet->param_length;
129  if(p_make_packet->packet_buf_capacity < generated_param_len+param_len+6 //6 = Header(2)+ID(1)+Length(1)+Instruction(1)+CheckSum(1) : http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#instruction-packet
130  || generated_param_len+param_len > 255-2){ //Length Frame Range(1byte) = Instruction(1)+Param(N)+CheckSum(1) : http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#length
131  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_BUFFER_OVERFLOW;
132  }
133 
134  p_param_buf = &p_make_packet->p_packet_buf[DXL1_0_PACKET_IDX_PARAM];
135 
136  for (i=0; i<param_len; i++)
137  {
138  p_param_buf[generated_param_len++] = p_param[i];
139  }
140 
141  p_make_packet->param_length = generated_param_len;
142 
143  return DXL_LIB_OK;
144 }
145 
146 static DXLLibErrorCode_t add_param_to_dxl2_0_packet(InfoToMakeDXLPacket_t* p_make_packet, uint8_t *p_param, uint16_t param_len)
147 {
148  uint8_t *p_packet, *p_param_buf;
149  uint16_t i, generated_param_len;
150 
151  generated_param_len = p_make_packet->param_length;
152  p_packet = p_make_packet->p_packet_buf;
153  if(p_make_packet->inst_idx == DXL_INST_STATUS){
154  if(p_make_packet->packet_buf_capacity < generated_param_len+param_len+11){
155  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_BUFFER_OVERFLOW;
156  }
157  p_param_buf = &p_packet[DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_STATUS_PARAM];
158 
159  for (i=0; i<param_len; i++)
160  {
161  p_param_buf[generated_param_len++] = p_param[i];
162 
163  //Add byte stuffing (http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#processing-order-of-transmission)
164  if(generated_param_len >= 3){
165  if(p_param_buf[generated_param_len-3] == 0xFF
166  && p_param_buf[generated_param_len-2] == 0xFF
167  && p_param_buf[generated_param_len-1] == 0xFD){
168  p_param_buf[generated_param_len++] = 0xFD;
169  }
170  }else if(generated_param_len == 2){
171  if(p_packet[DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_ERROR] == 0xFF
172  && p_param_buf[generated_param_len-2] == 0xFF
173  && p_param_buf[generated_param_len-1] == 0xFD){
174  p_param_buf[generated_param_len++] = 0xFD;
175  }
176  }else if(generated_param_len == 1){
177  if(p_packet[DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_INST] == 0xFF
178  && p_packet[DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_ERROR] == 0xFF
179  && p_param_buf[generated_param_len-1] == 0xFD){
180  p_param_buf[generated_param_len++] = 0xFD;
181  }
182  }
183 
184  if(p_make_packet->packet_buf_capacity < generated_param_len+11){
185  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_BUFFER_OVERFLOW;
186  }
187  }
188  }else{ //Instruction Packet
189  if(p_make_packet->packet_buf_capacity < generated_param_len+param_len+10){
190  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_BUFFER_OVERFLOW;
191  }
192  p_param_buf = &p_packet[DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_INST_PARAM];
193 
194  for (i=0; i<param_len; i++)
195  {
196  p_param_buf[generated_param_len++] = p_param[i];
197 
198  //Add byte stuffing (http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#processing-order-of-transmission)
199  if(generated_param_len >= 3){
200  if(p_param_buf[generated_param_len-3] == 0xFF
201  && p_param_buf[generated_param_len-2] == 0xFF
202  && p_param_buf[generated_param_len-1] == 0xFD){
203  p_param_buf[generated_param_len++] = 0xFD;
204  }
205  }else if(generated_param_len == 2){
206  if(p_packet[DXL2_0_PACKET_IDX_INST] == 0xFF
207  && p_param_buf[generated_param_len-2] == 0xFF
208  && p_param_buf[generated_param_len-1] == 0xFD){
209  p_param_buf[generated_param_len++] = 0xFD;
210  }
211  }
212 
213  if(p_make_packet->packet_buf_capacity < generated_param_len+10){
214  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_BUFFER_OVERFLOW;
215  }
216  }
217  }
218 
219  p_make_packet->param_length = generated_param_len;
220 
221  return DXL_LIB_OK;
222 }
223 
224 
225 
226 DXLLibErrorCode_t end_make_dxl_packet(InfoToMakeDXLPacket_t* p_make_packet)
227 {
228  DXLLibErrorCode_t ret;
229 
230  if(p_make_packet == NULL){
231  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
232  }
233  if(p_make_packet->is_init == false){
234  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
235  }
236  if(p_make_packet->p_packet_buf == NULL){
237  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
238  }
239 
240  if(p_make_packet->protocol_ver == 2){
241  ret = end_make_dxl2_0_packet(p_make_packet);
242  }else if(p_make_packet->protocol_ver == 1){
243  ret = end_make_dxl1_0_packet(p_make_packet);
244  }else{
245  ret = DXL_LIB_ERROR_INVAILD_PROTOCOL_VERSION;
246  }
247 
248  return ret;
249 }
250 
251 static DXLLibErrorCode_t end_make_dxl1_0_packet(InfoToMakeDXLPacket_t* p_make_packet)
252 {
253  uint8_t *p_packet;
254  uint8_t check_sum = 0;
255  uint16_t i, generated_packet_len = 0;
256 
257  if(p_make_packet->packet_buf_capacity < p_make_packet->param_length+6 //6 = Header(2)+ID(1)+Length(1)+Instruction(1)+CheckSum(1) : http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#instruction-packet
258  || p_make_packet->param_length > 255-2){ //Length Frame Range(1byte) = Instruction(1)+Param(N)+CheckSum(1) : http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#length
259  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_BUFFER_OVERFLOW;
260  }
261 
262  p_packet = p_make_packet->p_packet_buf;
263 
264  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = 0xFF;
265  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = 0xFF;
266  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = p_make_packet->id;
267  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = p_make_packet->param_length+2; //2 = Instruction(1)+CheckSum(1)
268  if(p_make_packet->inst_idx == DXL_INST_STATUS){
269  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = p_make_packet->err_idx;
270  }else{
271  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = p_make_packet->inst_idx;
272  }
273  generated_packet_len += p_make_packet->param_length;
274 
275  for (i=DXL1_0_PACKET_IDX_ID; i<generated_packet_len; i++)
276  {
277  check_sum += p_packet[i];
278  }
279 
280  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = ~(check_sum);
281 
282  p_make_packet->generated_packet_length = generated_packet_len;
283 
284  return DXL_LIB_OK;
285 }
286 
287 static DXLLibErrorCode_t end_make_dxl2_0_packet(InfoToMakeDXLPacket_t* p_make_packet)
288 {
289  uint8_t *p_packet;
290  uint16_t i, generated_packet_len = 0, calculated_crc = 0;
291 
292  if(p_make_packet->inst_idx == DXL_INST_STATUS && p_make_packet->packet_buf_capacity < p_make_packet->param_length+11){
293  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_BUFFER_OVERFLOW;
294  }else if(p_make_packet->packet_buf_capacity < p_make_packet->param_length+10){
295  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_BUFFER_OVERFLOW;
296  }
297 
298  p_packet = p_make_packet->p_packet_buf;
299 
300  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = 0xFF;
301  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = 0xFF;
302  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = 0xFD;
303  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = 0x00;
304  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = p_make_packet->id;
305  if(p_make_packet->inst_idx == DXL_INST_STATUS){
306  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = (p_make_packet->param_length+4) >> 0; //4 = Instruction(1)+Error(1)+CRC(2)
307  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = (p_make_packet->param_length+4) >> 8; //4 = Instruction(1)+Error(1)+CRC(2)
308  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = p_make_packet->inst_idx;
309  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = p_make_packet->err_idx;
310  }else{
311  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = (p_make_packet->param_length+3) >> 0; //3 = Instruction(1)+CRC(2)
312  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = (p_make_packet->param_length+3) >> 8; //3 = Instruction(1)+CRC(2)
313  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = p_make_packet->inst_idx;
314  }
315  generated_packet_len += p_make_packet->param_length;
316 
317  for (i=0; i<generated_packet_len; i++)
318  {
319  update_dxl_crc(&calculated_crc, p_packet[i]);
320  }
321 
322  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = calculated_crc >> 0;
323  p_packet[generated_packet_len++] = calculated_crc >> 8;
324 
325  p_make_packet->generated_packet_length = generated_packet_len;
326 
327  return DXL_LIB_OK;
328 }
329

331 
332 DXLLibErrorCode_t begin_parse_dxl_packet(InfoToParseDXLPacket_t* p_parse_packet,
333  uint8_t protocol_ver, uint8_t* p_param_buf, uint16_t param_buf_capacity)
334 {
335  if(param_buf_capacity > 0 && p_param_buf == NULL){
336  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
337  }
338 
339  if(protocol_ver != 1 && protocol_ver != 2){
340  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_INVAILD_PROTOCOL_VERSION;
341  }
342 
343  p_parse_packet->protocol_ver = protocol_ver;
344  p_parse_packet->p_param_buf = p_param_buf;
345  p_parse_packet->param_buf_capacity = param_buf_capacity;
346  // p_parse_packet->recv_param_len = 0;
347  // p_parse_packet->parse_state = 0;
348  p_parse_packet->is_init = true;
349 
350  return DXL_LIB_OK;
351 }
352 
353 DXLLibErrorCode_t parse_dxl_packet(InfoToParseDXLPacket_t* p_parse_packet, uint8_t recv_data)
354 {
355  DXLLibErrorCode_t ret;
356 
357  if(p_parse_packet == NULL){
358  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
359  }else if(p_parse_packet->is_init == false){
360  return DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
361  }
362 
363  if(p_parse_packet->protocol_ver == 2){
364  ret = parse_dxl2_0_packet(p_parse_packet, recv_data);
365  }else if(p_parse_packet->protocol_ver == 1){
366  ret = parse_dxl1_0_packet(p_parse_packet, recv_data);
367  }else{
368  ret = DXL_LIB_ERROR_INVAILD_PROTOCOL_VERSION;
369  }
370 
371  return ret;
372 }
373 
374 static DXLLibErrorCode_t parse_dxl1_0_packet(InfoToParseDXLPacket_t* p_parse_packet, uint8_t recv_data)
375 {
376  DXLLibErrorCode_t ret = DXL_LIB_PROCEEDING;
377 
378  switch(p_parse_packet->parse_state)
379  {
380  case DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE:
381  if(p_parse_packet->header_cnt >= 2){
382  p_parse_packet->header_cnt = 0;
383  }
384  p_parse_packet->header[p_parse_packet->header_cnt++] = recv_data;
385  if(p_parse_packet->header_cnt == 2){
386  if(p_parse_packet->header[0] == 0xFF
387  && p_parse_packet->header[1] == 0xFF){
388  p_parse_packet->recv_param_len = 0;
389  p_parse_packet->calculated_check_sum = 0;
390  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_ID;
391  }else{
392  p_parse_packet->header[0] = p_parse_packet->header[1];
393  p_parse_packet->header[1] = 0;
394  p_parse_packet->header_cnt--;
395  }
396  }
397  break;
398 
399  case DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_ID:
400  if(recv_data != 0xFF){ //http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#packet-id
401  p_parse_packet->id = recv_data;
402  p_parse_packet->calculated_check_sum += recv_data;
403  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_LENGTH;
404  }else{
405  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE;
406  }
407  break;
408 
409  case DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_LENGTH:
410  if((uint16_t)recv_data > p_parse_packet->param_buf_capacity+2){ // 2 = Instruction(1) + CheckSum(1)
411  ret = DXL_LIB_ERROR_BUFFER_OVERFLOW;
412  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE;
413  }else if(recv_data < 2){ // 2 = Instruction(1) + CheckSum(1)
414  ret = DXL_LIB_ERROR_LENGTH;
415  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE;
416  }else{
417  p_parse_packet->packet_len = recv_data;
418  p_parse_packet->calculated_check_sum += recv_data;
419  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_INST_ERR;
420  }
421  break;
422 
423  case DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_INST_ERR:
424  p_parse_packet->inst_idx = recv_data;
425  p_parse_packet->err_idx = recv_data;
426  p_parse_packet->calculated_check_sum += recv_data;
427  p_parse_packet->recv_param_len = 0;
428  if(p_parse_packet->packet_len == 2){ // 2 = Instruction(1) + CheckSum(1)
429  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_CHECK_SUM;
430  }else{
431  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_PARAM;
432  if(p_parse_packet->p_param_buf == NULL){
433  ret = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
434  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE;
435  }
436  }
437  break;
438 
439  case DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_PARAM:
440  p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[p_parse_packet->recv_param_len++] = recv_data;
441  p_parse_packet->calculated_check_sum += recv_data;
442  if(p_parse_packet->recv_param_len == p_parse_packet->packet_len-2){ // 2 = Instruction(1) + CheckSum(1)
443  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_CHECK_SUM;
444  }
445  break;
446 
447  case DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_CHECK_SUM:
448  p_parse_packet->calculated_check_sum = ~(p_parse_packet->calculated_check_sum);
449  p_parse_packet->recv_check_sum = recv_data;
450  if(p_parse_packet->calculated_check_sum == p_parse_packet->recv_check_sum){
451  ret = DXL_LIB_OK;
452  }else{
453  ret = DXL_LIB_ERROR_CHECK_SUM;
454  }
455  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE;
456  break;
457 
458  default:
459  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL1_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE;
460  break;
461  }
462 
463  return ret;
464 }
465 
466 static DXLLibErrorCode_t parse_dxl2_0_packet(InfoToParseDXLPacket_t* p_parse_packet, uint8_t recv_data)
467 {
468  DXLLibErrorCode_t ret = DXL_LIB_PROCEEDING;
469  uint16_t byte_stuffing_cnt = 0;
470 
471  switch(p_parse_packet->parse_state)
472  {
473  case DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE:
474  if(p_parse_packet->header_cnt >= 3){
475  p_parse_packet->header_cnt = 0;
476  }
477  p_parse_packet->header[p_parse_packet->header_cnt++] = recv_data;
478  if(p_parse_packet->header_cnt == 3){
479  if(p_parse_packet->header[0] == 0xFF
480  && p_parse_packet->header[1] == 0xFF
481  && p_parse_packet->header[2] == 0xFD){
482  p_parse_packet->recv_param_len = 0;
483  p_parse_packet->calculated_crc = 0;
484  update_dxl_crc(&p_parse_packet->calculated_crc, 0xFF);
485  update_dxl_crc(&p_parse_packet->calculated_crc, 0xFF);
486  update_dxl_crc(&p_parse_packet->calculated_crc, 0xFD);
487  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_RESERVED;
488  }else{
489  p_parse_packet->header[0] = p_parse_packet->header[1];
490  p_parse_packet->header[1] = p_parse_packet->header[2];
491  p_parse_packet->header_cnt--;
492  }
493  }
494  break;
495 
496  case DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_RESERVED:
497  if(recv_data != 0xFD){ // http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#reserved
498  p_parse_packet->reserved = recv_data;
499  update_dxl_crc(&p_parse_packet->calculated_crc, recv_data);
500  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_ID;
501  }else{
502  ret = DXL_LIB_ERROR_WRONG_PACKET;
503  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE;
504  }
505  break;
506 
507  case DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_ID:
508  if(recv_data < 0xFD || recv_data == DXL_BROADCAST_ID){ //http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#packet-id
509  p_parse_packet->id = recv_data;
510  update_dxl_crc(&p_parse_packet->calculated_crc, recv_data);
511  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_LENGTH_L;
512  }else{
513  ret = DXL_LIB_ERROR_INVAILD_ID;
514  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE;
515  }
516  break;
517 
518  case DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_LENGTH_L:
519  p_parse_packet->packet_len = recv_data;
520  update_dxl_crc(&p_parse_packet->calculated_crc, recv_data);
521  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_LENGTH_H;
522  break;
523 
524  case DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_LENGTH_H:
525  p_parse_packet->packet_len |= recv_data<<8;
526  update_dxl_crc(&p_parse_packet->calculated_crc, recv_data);
527  if(p_parse_packet->packet_len < 3){ // 3 = Instruction(1)+CRC(2)
528  ret = DXL_LIB_ERROR_LENGTH;
529  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE;
530  }else{
531  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_INST;
532  }
533  break;
534 
535  case DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_INST:
536  p_parse_packet->inst_idx = recv_data;
537  update_dxl_crc(&p_parse_packet->calculated_crc, recv_data);
538  p_parse_packet->recv_param_len = 0;
539  p_parse_packet->err_idx = 0;
540  if(recv_data == DXL_INST_STATUS){
541  if(p_parse_packet->packet_len < 4){ // 4 = Instruction(1)+Error(1)+CRC(2)
542  ret = DXL_LIB_ERROR_LENGTH;
543  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE;
544  }else if(p_parse_packet->packet_len > p_parse_packet->param_buf_capacity+4){ // 4 = Instruction(1)+Error(1)+CRC(2)
545  ret = DXL_LIB_ERROR_BUFFER_OVERFLOW;
546  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE;
547  }else{
548  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_ERROR;
549  }
550  }else{
551  if(p_parse_packet->packet_len > p_parse_packet->param_buf_capacity+3){ // 3 = Instruction(1)+CRC(2)
552  ret = DXL_LIB_ERROR_BUFFER_OVERFLOW;
553  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE;
554  }else if(p_parse_packet->packet_len == 3){ // 3 = Instruction(1)+CRC(2)
555  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_CRC_L;
556  }else{
557  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_PARAM;
558  }
559  }
560  break;
561 
562  case DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_ERROR:
563  p_parse_packet->err_idx = recv_data;
564  update_dxl_crc(&p_parse_packet->calculated_crc, recv_data);
565  if(p_parse_packet->packet_len == 4){ // 4 = Instruction(1)+Error(1)+CRC(2)
566  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_CRC_L;
567  break;
568  }
569  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_PARAM;
570  break;
571 
572  case DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_PARAM:
573  if(p_parse_packet->p_param_buf == NULL){
574  ret = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
575  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE;
576  }
577 
578  p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[p_parse_packet->recv_param_len++] = recv_data;
579  update_dxl_crc(&p_parse_packet->calculated_crc, recv_data);
580 
581  //Remove byte stuffing (http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#processing-order-of-reception)
582  if(p_parse_packet->inst_idx == DXL_INST_STATUS){
583  if(p_parse_packet->recv_param_len >= 4){
584  if(p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[p_parse_packet->recv_param_len-4] == 0xFF
585  && p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[p_parse_packet->recv_param_len-3] == 0xFF
586  && p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[p_parse_packet->recv_param_len-2] == 0xFD
587  && p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[p_parse_packet->recv_param_len-1] == 0xFD){
588  p_parse_packet->recv_param_len--;
589  byte_stuffing_cnt++;
590  }
591  }else if(p_parse_packet->recv_param_len == 3){
592  if(p_parse_packet->err_idx == 0xFF
593  && p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[0] == 0xFF
594  && p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[1] == 0xFD
595  && p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[2] == 0xFD){
596  p_parse_packet->recv_param_len--;
597  byte_stuffing_cnt++;
598  }
599  }else if(p_parse_packet->recv_param_len == 2){
600  if(p_parse_packet->inst_idx == 0xFF
601  && p_parse_packet->err_idx == 0xFF
602  && p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[0] == 0xFD
603  && p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[1] == 0xFD){
604  p_parse_packet->recv_param_len--;
605  byte_stuffing_cnt++;
606  }
607  }
608  if(p_parse_packet->recv_param_len+byte_stuffing_cnt+4 == p_parse_packet->packet_len){ // 4 = Instruction(1)+Error(1)+CRC(2)
609  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_CRC_L;
610  }
611  }else{
612  if(p_parse_packet->recv_param_len >= 4){
613  if(p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[p_parse_packet->recv_param_len-4] == 0xFF
614  && p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[p_parse_packet->recv_param_len-3] == 0xFF
615  && p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[p_parse_packet->recv_param_len-2] == 0xFD
616  && p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[p_parse_packet->recv_param_len-1] == 0xFD){
617  p_parse_packet->recv_param_len--;
618  byte_stuffing_cnt++;
619  }
620  }else if(p_parse_packet->recv_param_len == 3){
621  if(p_parse_packet->inst_idx == 0xFF
622  && p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[0] == 0xFF
623  && p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[1] == 0xFD
624  && p_parse_packet->p_param_buf[2] == 0xFD){
625  p_parse_packet->recv_param_len--;
626  byte_stuffing_cnt++;
627  }
628  }
629  if(p_parse_packet->recv_param_len+byte_stuffing_cnt+3 == p_parse_packet->packet_len){ // 3 = Instruction(1)+CRC(2)
630  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_CRC_L;
631  }
632  }
633  break;
634 
635  case DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_CRC_L:
636  p_parse_packet->recv_crc = recv_data;
637  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_CRC_H;
638  break;
639 
640  case DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_CRC_H:
641  p_parse_packet->recv_crc |= recv_data<<8;
642  if (p_parse_packet->calculated_crc == p_parse_packet->recv_crc){
643  ret = DXL_LIB_OK;
644  }else{
645  ret = DXL_LIB_ERROR_CRC;
646  }
647  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE;
648  break;
649 
650  default:
651  p_parse_packet->parse_state = DXL2_0_PACKET_PARSING_STATE_IDLE;
652  break;
653  }
654 
655  return ret;
656 }
657

699 static void update_dxl_crc(uint16_t *p_crc_cur, uint8_t recv_data)
700 {
701  uint16_t crc;
702  uint16_t i;
703 
704  crc = *p_crc_cur;
705 
706  i = ((unsigned short)(crc >> 8) ^ recv_data) & 0xFF;
707  *p_crc_cur = (crc << 8) ^ pgm_read_word_near(crc_table + i);
708 }
